bodyPatterns.matchesJsonPath: $[?(@.prompt == 'Image of Dalai Lama winning a slam dunk contest')]

data.revised_prompt: A religious figure, an Asian man in traditional red and yellow monk attire, is in the midst of a slam dunk contest. With great agility and excitement, he jumps high to dunk the basketball into the hoop, the crowd erupting in cheers. The scene is set in a bustling basketball court with spectators on the edge of their seats, witnessing this unexpected victory.
